# Generate ANTLR autogeneration scripts
# This replaces the functionality previously in conanfile.py
function(create_antlr_script GRAMMAR_NAME ANTLR4_VERSION SCRIPT_PATH)
    set(SCRIPT_CONTENT "#!/bin/bash

#################################################################
# Auto-generated by CMakeLists.txt during configure             #
# DO NOT MODIFY DIRECTLY, modify it inside CMakeLists.txt instead.#
#################################################################

RED='\\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\\033[0;32m'
NORMAL_OUTPUT='\\033[0m'

# Work at the scripts directory
cd \"$(dirname \"$0\")\"

export ANTLR_HOME=\"~/.local/bin\"
export ANTLR_JAR=\"$ANTLR_HOME/antlr-${ANTLR4_VERSION}-complete.jar\"
export CLASSPATH=\".:$ANTLR_JAR:$CLASSPATH\"
alias antlr4=\"java -jar $ANTLR_JAR\"
alias grun=\"java org.antlr.v4.gui.TestRig\"

on_error() {
    echo -e \"$\{RED\}An error occurred, script has aborted.$NORMAL_OUTPUT\"
}

set -e
trap on_error ERR

echo -e \"$\{GREEN\}Installing antlr-${ANTLR4_VERSION}\" if it is not installed already.$NORMAL_OUTPUT
mkdir -p ~/.local/bin
cd ~/.local/bin && [ ! -f \"antlr-${ANTLR4_VERSION}-complete.jar\" ] && wget https://www.antlr.org/download/antlr-${ANTLR4_VERSION}-complete.jar
cd -

echo -e \"$\{GREEN\}Generating antlr files.$NORMAL_OUTPUT\"

if [ -d \"autogenerated\" ]; then
    rm -r \"autogenerated\"
fi
mkdir -p autogenerated
java -jar ~/.local/bin/antlr-${ANTLR4_VERSION}-complete.jar -o autogenerated -no-listener -visitor -Dlanguage=Cpp ${GRAMMAR_NAME}Lexer.g4
java -jar ~/.local/bin/antlr-${ANTLR4_VERSION}-complete.jar -o autogenerated -no-listener -visitor -Dlanguage=Cpp ${GRAMMAR_NAME}Parser.g4
echo -e \"$\{GREEN\}Finishing the auto-generation of ${GRAMMAR_NAME} successfully.$NORMAL_OUTPUT\"
")
    file(WRITE ${SCRIPT_PATH} ${SCRIPT_CONTENT})
    execute_process(COMMAND chmod +x ${SCRIPT_PATH})
endfunction()

# Create ANTLR autogeneration scripts for all grammar parsers
